The
Abyssal Snails are ancient creatures originating from times long past. They have only recently resurfaces in the grassy plains of the
5th Layer. They keep to the bright and grassy areas, due to them not being able to escape predators. :hypers:
§#1fab44-#fcc82b-#423924§Behaviour Details: Since Abyssal Snails are herbivores, they love to stay in the flower fields found throughout the 5th Layer. They can also be ridden, though since they are snails, they are naturally not the most useful and quick transport for Delvers. :hypers:
§#1fab44-#fcc82b-#423924§Item Drops: The Abyssal Snails do not have much use for Delvers. Its
gunk can be sold to vendors, as they are thought to be useful in anti-aging potions. Their
shells are mainly sold as decor, as there has not been a known use case for them just yet. :hypers:
